metadata.synopsis: One of the hostages thanks you for saving them from the Iron Throne. One-liner dialog.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to Ceres Olsin - S_GLO_IronThrone_Group1_Prisoner2 ced0a558-b5ed-4493-a499-1890ec48fbfb - (-58; 37; 71)  in the Dock warehouse after saving them.Quick setup:- Load CTY_Main_A- Use Debug Book (Ctrl + Shift + 9)- Set Quest Flags and Options -> Act3 (LOW) -> Iron Throne -> Change State -> Back At Docks -> MajoritySaved- Then talk to the NPC

0.speaker: Ceres Olsin
0.text: By Gond I'm glad you showed up... Hopefully Frell's not too worried about me.

1.speaker: Ceres Olsin
1.text: Of course he's going to worry, Frell always worries, Gond help him...
